Welcome to the Schools and Colleges Liaison web site. We are here to help you with the daunting tasks of deciding which Higher Education Institution to attend, which course to do and how to apply.
We want to help everyone reach their full potential.
The Schools and Colleges Liaison team offer:
• advice at Higher Education fairs
